generalItems.name: Gift card for Dillards (or cash)
generalItems.blurb: I need smaller belts and pants!

generalItems.name: Massage
generalItems.blurb: Still waiting to see what Christin thinks of Milk and Honey's massages, but I have been wanting one myself for a while.

generalItems.name: Anything else you think I would like

specificItems.name: Dorohedoro, Vol. 4 and above
specificItems.blurb: I like this series! There are 20-something in total, but I only have Volumes 1 through 3 at the moment.

specificItems.name: CrankBrothers F15 Multitool
specificItems.blurb: Need a multi-tool if I'm going to go out on a bike. When riding my current bicycle (that I'm planning on replacing) I have been taking tools with me in case I need to tighten anything.

specificItems.name: Ticket to Ride
specificItems.blurb: Another board game I've been wanting. Don't get this from Amazon as a lot of reviews have been saying it's a counterfeit copy.

specificItems.name: Saris Bones 2 Bike Rack
specificItems.blurb: I'd like a bike rack for my car. You can get this locally from the bike shop down the street, Bycicles Inc.

specificItems.name: Park Tool Home Mechanic Repair Stand - PCS-9.2
specificItems.blurb: Even with the small amount of work I have put into bikes so far, working on them without a stand is a real pain.

specificItems.name: Dell S Series LED-lit Monitor
specificItems.blurb: I'd like to get a larger monitor for my computer. Price for this particular one varies as availability varies.

specificItems.name: CZ 75 B Omega Convertible
specificItems.blurb: It's a handgun I want. Pretty pricey so cash gift to contribute would be fine.

specificItems.name: Parts for my PC
specificItems.blurb: I'd like to do an upgrade for my desktop computer. It will take me about $1,000 to get it to where I want it. Any cash gifts would be fine.
